greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n - A002487(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8192
mathematica: a[n_] :=If[n<2, n, If[ EvenQ[n], a[n/2], a[(n - 1)/2] + a[(n + 1)/2]]]; Table[n - a[n], {n , 0, 100}] (* _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 23 2017 *)
program: (Scheme) (define (A284013 n) (- n (A002487 n))) ;; Code for A002487 given under that entry.
def a(n): return n if n<2 else (a(n//2) if n%2==0 else a((n - 1)//2) + a((n + 1)//2))
print([n - a(n) for n in range(101)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 23 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 23 2017
